Bet on Stamford this year!

We're going "all in" on celebrating Stamford this year! Join us for our Annual Best of Stamford event - Presented by the Stamford Chamber of Commerce. Our Chamber Members as well as our community are invited to join us Saturday, February 7, 2025 at the Old Timers Round Up Hall, just south of the TCR Rodeo Groups to have a fun-filled night to fundraise for our Chamber of Commerce and to celebrate some of our local “Bests” with an award ceremony.

Doors open at 5:30 p.m. and will end at 8:45 p.m.

**All tickets must be pre-purchased at this link or from the Chamber of Commerce.

This year's fundraising event will feature a professionally run casino night, from The E-Casino Events in Dallas, complete with craps, roulette, and black jack! Your pre-purchased tickets includes $1000 additional "play money" to spend at the tables and a free raffle ticket to enter into our drawings at the end of the evening.

Citizen & Business of the Year—2025!

We need your help! Please make your nominations here for the categories of Business of the Year and Citizen(s) of the Year. Nominations will close Sunday, January 4, 2026. 

The top three nominations for each category will then be presented to our Chamber of Commerce members for a final vote. Award winners will be announced at the Best of Stamford event on Saturday, February 7, 202.

**For your nomination to be considered you will need to provide 2-5 sentences explaining the reasoning for your recommendation. Name only nominations, or nominations with no reasoning will be considered VOID. We want to know what makes each of your nominations worthy of these awards, so that we can then share these statements with our voting members!
